definition: Niels Henrik Abel (1802-1829), Norwegian mathematician/(math.) abelian
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]

sentences.english: We will be along with Abel.
The ellipse rotating symmetric group is proposed, which is an Abelian group.
sentences.chinese: 提出橢圓旋轉對稱羣，它是一個單參數阿貝爾羣。

sentences.english: This includes Fourier series, the Fourier transform, and Fourier analysis on (some) abelian groups.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分研究有限阿貝爾羣上的傅立葉分析。

sentences.english: Kayaking in Abel Tasman is such a great fun!
sentences.chinese: 阿貝爾塔斯曼的皮划艇是如此的有趣。

sentences.english: By, we prove that a separative abelian regular ring is an APT ring.
sentences.chinese: 由，還證明了分離的阿貝爾正則環是APT環。
